page.title: 14Izatt Avenue,Pitreavie
page.content: Izatt Avenue Estate is a housing area with over two hundred houses. It stretches between the railway line and Queensferry Road, where there is St. Leonard's School,attended by some of the children, and Dunfermline High School. Other Primary school children have to cross the dual carriageway to attend Pitreavie Primary School. The local ambulance depot and the West Fife Maternity Hospital and Clinic are also sited there. There is only one shop, a newsagent & grocery shop/ Now that the High School is a Community School, people in this area can join in many sports activities, swimming, skiing practice & tennis as well as evening classes. As the Fine Fare Supermarket is just across the main road, the shopping facilities are good. Derek Stevenson.
